title: network issue
body:
when i start a game at the loading page it shows me the teams and then shows a message disconnected,check your internet connection while it's connected and everything is okay 
can anybody help me?

replies.body:
Network disconnection messages are often caused by your client not being able to establish a stable connection to the server. Local network configurations or ISP routing are often the culprits of these issues. I recommend taking a look at the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in resolving this.

Let me know if this helped.
